cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.method: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

cocktails.name: Champagne cocktail
cocktails.method: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Corpse reviver #2
cocktails.method: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish with orange zest.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.method: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.

cocktails.name: Cuba libre
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.method: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.
ingredients: 15 ml (0.51 US fl oz) lemon juice
15 ml (0.51 US fl oz) simple syrup

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Golden dream
cocktails.method: Shake with cracked ice.  Strain into glass and serve.

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
cocktails.method: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hemingway special
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

cocktails.name: Horse's neck
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.method: Pour the coffee into a preheated glass, add whiskey and sugar, and stir until dissolved. Pour cream slowly to form a distinct layer.

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.method: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

cocktails.name: Long Island iced tea
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.method: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

cocktails.name: Mint julep
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.
ingredients: 6 cL (2.0 US fl oz) bourbon whiskey

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Mix mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice
ingredients: 2 teaspoons white cane sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)

cocktails.name: Moscow mule
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

cocktails.name: Piña colada
cocktails.method: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve.

cocktails.name: Pisco sour
cocktails.method: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.
ingredients: Several drops of aromatic bitters at the end

cocktails.name: Sea breeze
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Sex on the beach
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktails.name: Singapore sling
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.

cocktails.name: Tequila sunrise
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Mix ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice and shake. Pour into a tall tumbler glass.
ingredients: 15 ml Donn's Mix (2 parts fresh white grapefruit juice and 1 part cinnamon syrup)

cocktails.name: Barracuda
cocktails.method: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with sparkling wine.

cocktails.name: Bee's knees
cocktails.method: Combine gin, honey syrup and lemon juice into a mixing tin. Shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.

cocktails.name: Canchanchara
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' stormy
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
ingredients: 60 ml Goslings Rum100 ml Ginger Beer

cocktails.name: Espresso martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Fernandito
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Fill a double old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in the Fernet-Branca, fill the glass with cola. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: French martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

cocktails.name: Illegal
cocktails.served:
Served in one of two ways:
Straight up (no ice) in a chilled cocktail glass
On the rocks (over ice) in a traditional clay or terracotta mug
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" into a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

cocktails.name: Lemon drop martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

cocktails.name: Naked and famous
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: New York sour
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour the whiskey, syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top. Garnish with lemon or orange zest and cherry.

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients except the wine into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine and garnish with mint sprigs

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Paper plane
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Lagavulin whisky. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the Lagavulin whisky on top.

cocktails.name: Russian spring punch
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.

cocktails.name: Southside
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Spritz
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Suffering bastard
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Shake everything but ginger beer with ice, pour unstrained into glass, top with ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Tipperary
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktails.name: Tommy's margarita
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
ingredients: 30 ml Agave syrup (1/2 water + 1/2 agave nectar)

cocktails.name: Trinidad sour
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Ve.n.to
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.
ingredients: 1.5 cl honey mix (made with chamomile infusion if desired)

cocktails.name: Yellow bird
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into an old fashioned glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Angel face
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Aviation
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Between the sheets
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Brandy crusta
cocktails.method: Mix all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass.  Strain into slim cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.method: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.
ingredients: 1 egg white or 20 ml aquafaba or 4 drops cocktail foamer

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.method: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Dry martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
ingredients: 10 ml (0.34 US fl oz) dry vermouth

cocktails.name: Gin fizz
cocktails.method: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Hanky panky
cocktails.method: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
ingredients: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice

cocktails.name: Last word
cocktails.method: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.method: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.method: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Monkey gland
cocktails.method: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Old fashioned
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.method: Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

cocktails.name: Planter's punch
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

cocktails.name: Porto flip
cocktails.method: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice.  Strain into glass, garnish and serve

cocktails.name: Ramos fizz
cocktails.method: All ingredients except the soda are poured in a mixing glass, dry shaken (no ice) for two minutes, then ice is added and shaken hard for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice and topped with soda.

cocktails.name: Rusty nail
cocktails.served: On the rocks: poured over ice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.method: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.method: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carré
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Whiskey sour
cocktails.served: On the rocks or straight up
cocktails.method: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: White lady
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.
